### Hiring
I am open for part-time work! Shoot me an email at superman3275@gmail.com. I live in central texas (DFW). Be warned - currently, hiring me might require special accommodations. Fear not, young padawan: I'm sure we can work these out!

### DarkPython
There's a problem with programming education. Most schools use old technology which teach terrible practices. DarkPython is a fully featured IDE designed for kids programming in Python + Pygame. It is programmed in wxWidgets, Scintilla, and Pygame. Some of it's many features:

* A tabbed editor.
* Syntax Highlighting.
* A full featured debugger.

Features which are currently being worked on:
* A pygame preview window.
* A GUI debugger with line highlighting.

### Hooded
Hooded is a project I work on in my spare time: A fast and fun 2D RPG-ish Platformer in Python + Pygame. You can find it [right here](http://superman3275.github.io/Hooded/)!

### What I've Made
I've made multiple projects in both C++ and Python. Right now I'm working on DarkPython. I also occasionally work on Hooded.
